dabaosword.shifttooltip: Press shift down for more info
dabaosword.draw.monster: You killed a monster and drew one card
dabaosword.draw.player: You killed a player and drew two cards
dabaosword.change_skill: You can now change your skill
dabaosword.change_skill2: Place the skill you want to change to in your off-hand and right-click while sneaking to change.
item.dabaosword.gudingdao.tooltip: Those who encroach upon the territory of Wu will surely be vanquished!
item.dabaosword.gudingdao.tooltip1: Deals double damage to unequipped creatures
item.dabaosword.gudingdao.tooltip2: Deals 5 more damage to unequipped creatures
item.dabaosword.rattanarmor.tooltip: Wearing it makes one buoyant in water and impervious to arrows and blades
item.dabaosword.peach.tooltip2: Can be used on entities while sneaking
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip: With King Fuchai's Water Army, three thousand strong crossbows shoot the tide low. ——Su Dongpo
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip6: I have plenty of arrows ready!
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip7: No shortage of arrows, only enemies yet to die.
item.dabaosword.too_happy: Too Happy to Think of Home
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip: In this moment of joy, one forgets home
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip1: Grants the target a 5-second (15 seconds for non-players) 'Too Happy to Think of Home' effect
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip2: Affected creatures cannot move and regular attack can't work.
item.dabaosword.steal.tooltip1: Randomly obtain one card from the opponent's inventory
item.dabaosword.steal.tooltip2: “效马效羊者右牵之”  ——《礼记·曲礼上》
dabaosword.steal.title: Steal: Acquire a card or armor from the opponent
item.dabaosword.discard.tooltip1: Randomly discard one card from the opponent's inventory (will disappear immediately!)
item.dabaosword.discard.tooltip2: “你休得顺水推船，偏不许我过河拆桥”  ——康进之
dabaosword.discard.title: %1$s: Discard one of the opponent's cards
item.dabaosword.shan.tooltip: Upon use, dash forward and be invulnerable for 1 second
item.dabaosword.sha&shan.tooltip: Automatically triggered when placed in the first 18 slots of your inventory
item.dabaosword.jiu.tooltip: grants Strength for 10 seconds upon use
item.dabaosword.recover.tip: Automatically triggers healing effect when close to death
item.dabaosword.card_pile.tooltip: In survival or adventure mode, grants players two cards per minute
item.dabaosword.wuzhong.tooltip2: All things sprang from something. Something sprang from nothing.  ——《Tao Te Ching》
item.dabaosword.wuxie.tooltip1: Passively defends against cards like Too happy, Steal and so on.
item.dabaosword.wuxie.tooltip2: Exploit their laxity, exploit their emptiness.  ——Cao Cao
item.dabaosword.huogong.tooltip: Where there's fire, there's a reason; where there's smoke, there's a cause.  ——Sun Tzu
item.dabaosword.juedou.tooltip: If you have more Slash cards than target, deal 5 damage to target
dabaosword.juedou1: You've shot yourself in the foot
item.dabaosword.bingliang.tooltip: Man may be made of iron, but not eating leaves one famished
item.dabaosword.bingliang.tooltip2: Affected players remain weakened until two Draw Card are removed
item.dabaosword.tiesuo.tooltip: Upon use on a entity, connects all entities within ten blocks in front of you
item.dabaosword.jiedao.tooltip: Obtains the main hand item of the opponent
item.dabaosword.nanman.tooltip1: ‘A southern barbarian holding a spear invaded, causing the enemy troops of a hundred to flee’
item.dabaosword.nanman.tooltip2: Summons three invincible dogs for combat; they disappear after 20 seconds
nanman.dog2: I'm the dog of Kamisato Ayaka!
item.dabaosword.taoyuan.tooltip: Restores 5 health to all online players
item.dabaosword.qinggang.tooltip1: “云乃拔青釭剑乱砍，手起处，衣甲平过，血如涌泉”
item.dabaosword.qinggang.tooltip2: Deals additional true damage equal to 20% of the opponent's max health points (up to 20)
item.dabaosword.chitu.tooltip: Lock-on skill, increases your reach by 2
item.dabaosword.dilu.tooltip: Lock-on skill, increases your melee defense range by 2
item.dabaosword.gift_box.tooltip: Hold gold ingots or gold blocks in the off-hand, right-click to draw a skill
item.dabaosword.sha.tooltip: Consumes this card after hitting to increase damage by 5
item.dabaosword.fire_sha.tooltip: Consumes this card after hitting to set the target on fire for 5 seconds
item.dabaosword.thunder_sha.tooltip: Consumes this card after hitting to deal additional 5 magic damage
item.dabaosword.hanbing.tooltip: Inflicts frostbite on the target upon hit
item.dabaosword.bagua.tooltip: 50% chance to dodge before damaged, 3-second cooldown
dabaosword.bagua: You successfully activated Eight Trigrams Formation and used a Dash
item.dabaosword.qinglong.tooltip1: “刀势即大，其三十六刀法，兵仗遇之，无不屈者，刀类中以此为第一” ——《三才图会·器用》
item.dabaosword.qinglong.tooltip2: Teleport to the target, knock them back, and gain temporary invincibility
item.dabaosword.fangtian.tooltip1: “豹子尾摇穿画戟，雄兵十万脱征衣”  ——《三国演义》
item.dabaosword.fangtian.tooltip2: After hitting an entity, left-click to deal area damage for 5 seconds, 15s cooldown
dabaosword.fangtian: You triggered the effect of the Heavenly Halberd!
equipment.tip1: Cannot be unequipped directly once equipped
equipment.tip2: Hold a new equipment card and right-click to replace the existing equipment
item.dabaosword.guose.tooltip: Converts one Shan card on the off-hand into 'Too Happy to Think of Home'
item.dabaosword.liuli.tooltip: When attacked, discard a card and transfer damage to other creatures within 5 blocks
item.dabaosword.jueqing.tooltip1: Lock-on skill. When hitting, changes to dealing damage without a source
item.dabaosword.jueqing.tooltip2: Ignores defense, and cannot crit(up tp 6)
item.dabaosword.luanji.tooltip: Converts two cards on the off-hand into 'Arrow Rain'
item.dabaosword.yiji.tooltip: When receiving damage, if your health is 12 or below, draw two cards
item.dabaosword.yiji.tooltip2: (Active) Then you can give two cards to other players
give_card.title: %1$s: Choose a card to give to the opponent
item.dabaosword.pojun.tooltip: When attacking a target, strip off all their armor
item.dabaosword.kuanggu.tooltip: When damaged, restores 5 health points or draw one card
item.dabaosword.kurou.tooltip: Active skill, Lose 5 health points and draw 2 cards
item.dabaosword.kurou.tip: Current health points are below 5! Cannot activate Sacrifice
item.dabaosword.luoyi.tooltip: Lock-on skill. Your attack damage + X (X refers to your empty armor slot(s)+1)
item.dabaosword.huoji.tooltip: Converts one basic card on the off-hand into 'Fire Attack'
item.dabaosword.kanpo.tooltip: Converts one non-basic card on the off-hand into 'Invincible'
item.dabaosword.jizhi.tooltip: After using a scroll card, draw one card
item.dabaosword.quanji.tooltip1: When receiving damage from entity, gain one 'Power'; next attack increases damage by the amount of 'Power'
item.dabaosword.quanji.tooltip2: Then halve the 'Power'. If the opponent is a player and 'Power' is greater than 4, the opponent draws two cards.
item.dabaosword.qice.tip: You need two cards on the off-hand to activate Brilliant Plan
item.dabaosword.qice.tooltip: Active skill, Converts two cards on the off-hand into any scroll
item.dabaosword.taoluan.tip: Active skill, Current health points are below 5! Cannot activate Chaos
item.dabaosword.taoluan.tooltip: Lose 5 health points and obtain any card
item.dabaosword.benxi.tooltip1: After using the card, increase reach distance by 1 (up to 5)
item.dabaosword.benxi.tooltip2: After a successful hit, decrease reach distance by 2 and draw 1 card
item.dabaosword.gongao.tooltip1: Lock-on skill. Increases max health after killing hostile entities or players.
item.dabaosword.gongao.tooltip2: If your max health is >= 25, decreases 5 max health every 30s and draws two cards.
item.dabaosword.liegong.tooltip1: If not in cooldown, reach distance +13
item.dabaosword.liegong.tooltip2: When hitting, damage + (13 - distance, at least 5) and cannot be dodged
item.dabaosword.duanliang.tooltip: Convert a non-basic card in the off-hand to Starvation
item.dabaosword.luoshen.tooltip: Active skill, 50% chance to draw a card after use, otherwise a 30s cooldown
item.dabaosword.luoshen.win: Good fortune, you drew a card
item.dabaosword.luoshen.lose: Luo Shen failed, wait for cooldown
item.dabaosword.qingguo.tooltip: Convert a non-basic card in the off-hand to Dash
item.dabaosword.qixi.tooltip: Convert a non-basic card in the off-hand to Discard
item.dabaosword.bbji.tooltip: Right-click to deal 2 true damage to entities within 13 blocks
item.dabaosword.fangzhu.tooltip: After taking damage, inflict the Turn Over effect on the source of the damage
item.dabaosword.xingshang.tooltip: When another player dies nearby, you gain all their cards
item.dabaosword.ganglie.tooltip1: Triggered each time you take 5 points of damage (or less). There is a 50% chance
item.dabaosword.ganglie.tooltip2: to deal the same damage to the source, otherwise discard one of their cards.
item.dabaosword.tieji.tooltip1: When attacking, if you have Slash, you disable the target's
item.dabaosword.tieji.tooltip2: non-lock-on skills and have a 75% chance to make the attack unavoidable
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip: When near death, there is a chance to recover to 5 health points and gain a 'Scar'
buqu.tip1: Your undying body endured the hit, current 'Scar' count:
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip1: Triggers automatically, prioritizing over Peach and Wine
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip2: If 'Scar' is 0, it will definitely trigger successfully
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip3: If 'Scar' is 1, there is a 1/13 chance to fail
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip4: If 'Scar' is 2, there is a 2/13 chance to fail, and so on
item.dabaosword.buqu.tooltip5: After death, the number of 'Scar' is halved (rounded up)
item.dabaosword.zhiheng.tooltip1: Active skill, discard a card to draw a card (small chance to draw 2)
item.dabaosword.zhiheng.tooltip2: Gains 1 usage every 5 seconds, up to 10 uses
zhiheng.extra: You drew an extra card through Balance
zhiheng.title: Balance: Discard one card, then draw one card
item.dabaosword.rende.tooltip1: Active skill, you can give a card to another player
item.dabaosword.rende.tooltip2: Then there is a chance to recover 5 health points (healing cooldown 30s)
item.dabaosword.gongxin.tooltip: Active skill, view another player's cards and discard one
gongxin.title: Insight: View and discard an opponent's card
item.dabaosword.zhijian.tooltip1: Active skill, equip an equipment card from your main hand to another player
item.dabaosword.zhijian.tooltip2: (Can replace existing equipment) Then you draw a card
zhijian.fail: Straightforward Advice: You need to hold an equipment card in your main hand to activate!
item.dabaosword.shanzhuan.tooltip1: After a successful attack, you can discard one of the opponent's cards
item.dabaosword.shanzhuan.tooltip2: Then they receive either a Starvation or Too happy effect
item.dabaosword.longdan.tooltip1: You can transform a 'Slash' in your off-hand into a 'Dash'
item.dabaosword.let_me_cc.tooltip: Let me see if you're growing properly
item.dabaosword.lianying.tooltip: 5 seconds after you lose your last hand card, you draw a card
item.dabaosword.xiaoji.tooltip: When you lose an equipped equipment card, you draw two cards
item.dabaosword.shensu.tooltip1: The more empty slots you have in your inventory, the faster your movement speed (up to 1.5x)
item.dabaosword.shensu.tooltip2: If not in cooldown, your attack damage increases with your current speed
sounds.dabaosword.jiedao: Borrow a Knife to Kill: use
sounds.dabaosword.lebu: Too Happy to Think of Home: use
advancement.dabaosword.root.title: 蒸蒸日上！
advancement.dabaosword.card_pile.title: 牌不是万能的，但是没牌是万万不能的
advancement.dabaosword.card_pile.tip: 用8张纸和黑色染料制作牌堆
advancement.dabaosword.gift_box.title: 全力氪金，言贵者，斩！
advancement.dabaosword.gift_box.tip: 把一组绿宝石扔给傻子村民
